content:
Theory Revision

  • Differs from FOCL

    • Emulate Human Modifying Domain Theory
    • Preserve abstractions in domain theory
    • Minimal Change to domain theory

  • Evaluating Theory Revision

    • Accuracy
    • Edit Distance (Wogulis & Pazzani, 1993)

  • Hill climbing approaches

    • Either (Ourston & Mooney, 1990)
    • Forte (Richards & Mooney, 1992)
    • A3 (Wogulis & Pazzani, 1993)
    • Tangkitvanich, 1993

  • Operators: Add/delete literal/clause

  • Evaluation function: Accuracy
